alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 7:51PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Alleghany and northern Ashe Counties in northwestern North Carolina, south central Wythe and Grayson Counties in southwestern Virginia through 830 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Jefferson, to Mouth of Wilson, to Elk Creek, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jefferson... West Jefferson... Independence... Fries... Lansing... Mouth Of Wilson... and Speedwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
